snippet.title: King Kaiju Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now on Steam and the HTC Vive http://store.steampowered.com/app/556340. Live the Dream! Be the Monster! Smash your way through a completely destructible virtual reality city. A simple and silly sandbox game for your inner Kaiju.

A collaboration between Fire Hose Games and Chris Chung.
